column4: Hello. I have a problem with compiz "Place window" plugin. I have a rule for pidgin (match string is "class=Pidgin"), but its roster opens on the current workspace instead of specified one. 'xprop WM_CLASS' for the roster window returns 'Piding'. Also note that chat window opens on the correct workspace. Any ideas?
No, questions are to be asked here. Unity is a Ubuntu-only project anyway.
well, then I'll try to ask later again
